action.action-desc: Mr. Gene Green of Texas (for himself and Mr. Burgess) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the program of payments to children’s hospitals that operate graduate medical education programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Children's Hospital GME Support Reauthorization Act of 2018.

section.header: Program of payments to children's hospitals that operate graduate medical education programs
section.text: Section 340E of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 256e) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking and each of fiscal years 2014 through 2018, and inserting , each of fiscal years 2014 through 2018, and each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023,;
in subsection (b)(3)(D), by inserting and the end of fiscal year 2022, after fiscal year 2018,; and

clause.text: in clause (iv), by striking ; and and inserting ;;
in clause (v), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023, $110,000,000.
in subparagraph (D), by striking ; and and inserting ;;
in subparagraph (E), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023, $220,000,000.
